actionable_tasks.title: Persist Rolling Window Metrics to Redis
actionable_tasks.description: Implement persistence of API latency and error metrics using a rolling window in Redis for durability and multi-instance aggregation. This will improve reliability and scalability of performance monitoring.
implementation_steps: Set up Redis connection in src/config/redis.js (or similar config file).
Modify metrics middleware to write rolling window data to Redis after each request.
Update scripts/bench/api-latency.js to read/write metrics from Redis instead of in-memory.
Test durability and aggregation by simulating multi-instance writes and reads.

actionable_tasks.title: TypeScript Migration Plan for High-Change Backend Modules
actionable_tasks.description: Draft and begin implementing a migration plan to convert backend modules with high change-rate (e.g., src/api/routes/*, src/chat/*) from JavaScript to TypeScript. This will improve code quality and maintainability.
implementation_steps: Create or update tsconfig.json for backend.
Identify and list all high-change JS files in src/api/routes/* and src/chat/*.
Convert one representative file to TypeScript, adding type annotations and interfaces.
Document migration steps and common patterns for the team.

actionable_tasks.title: Containerize Node Backend with Simple Dockerfile
actionable_tasks.description: Create a basic Dockerfile for the Node backend service to enable containerized development and deployment. This will facilitate consistent environments and easier scaling.
implementation_steps: Write a Dockerfile that installs dependencies and runs the Node backend.
Add a service entry to docker-compose.yml for the backend.
Test local build and run to verify containerization.
Document usage in README.md.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Jest Integration/Security Tests for MCP Endpoints
actionable_tasks.description: Add new Jest tests to cover MCP endpoints and provider health, focusing on integration and basic security checks. This will increase test coverage and reliability.
implementation_steps: Identify MCP endpoints and provider health routes.
Write integration tests for endpoint responses and error handling.
Add basic security tests (e.g., authentication, input validation).
Run and verify test suite passes.

actionable_tasks.title: EnhancedChatInterface: Provider Quick-Switch and Badge
actionable_tasks.description: Add a provider quick-switch UI element and display the current provider badge in EnhancedChatInterface.jsx using useLLM(). Improves user experience and transparency.
implementation_steps: Implement provider quick-switch dropdown/button using useLLM().
Display current provider as a badge/chip in the chat interface.
Test switching and badge updates in the UI.

actionable_tasks.title: EnhancedMusicDiscovery: Client-Only Radar/Sparkline for Mood Settings
actionable_tasks.description: Add a radar or sparkline chart to EnhancedMusicDiscovery.jsx to visualize moodSettings values client-side. This will enhance user feedback and engagement.
implementation_steps: Choose a lightweight chart library (e.g., Chart.js, Recharts) or implement a simple SVG chart.
Map moodSettings values to chart data.
Render radar/sparkline chart in the component.
Test with mock data.

actionable_tasks.title: EnhancedAnalyticsDashboard: Sparkline Components for Overview Metrics
actionable_tasks.description: Add sparkline components to EnhancedAnalyticsDashboard.jsx for top metrics using mock fallback data. Improves dashboard clarity and visual appeal.
implementation_steps: Implement sparkline chart components for key metrics.
Use mock data for initial rendering.
Integrate with real data sources as available.
Test UI responsiveness.
